messages.subject: Allergies/autism/NAET/BIOSET was mindful parenting
messages.msgSnippet: . ... Dr. Ellen Cutler uses Dr. Nambudripad s Allergy Elimination Technique (NAET) and combines it with enzyme/nutritional healing supplements and many other
messages.messageBody:
.
>Eileen, you might also be interested in checking out the book "Say >Goodbye
>to Allergy-Related Autism" by Dr. Nambudripad.

Dr. Ellen Cutler uses Dr. Nambudripad's Allergy Elimination Technique (NAET) and combines it with enzyme/nutritional healing supplements and many other things. Using NAET with the other techniques is called BIOSET. I have found Dr. Cutler's books at the library. You can research both of these at

http://www.naet.com http://www.drellencutler.com

It is our local Dr. that is trained in these methods that introduced us to green juices and other dietary measures that have been instrumental in our healing process. We plan to continue with BIOSET.

Annette
